1 of 2 people found the following review helpful
5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely piece of kit, 6 Mar. 2015
By 
Sporehesajollygoodfellow "nwr99" (UK) - See all my reviews
Verified Purchase(What is this?)
This review is from: MediaDevil HTC One M8 (2014) leather case (Rustic Brown [Special Edition]) - Artisancover genuine European leather case with integrated stand (Electronics)
This is a beautifully made case. I am very pleased with it. As others have said it probably won't protect against all types of drop but if thats a main concern there are plenty of 'tough' cases out there but none look as classy as this case. The stand works nicely and the phone now sits flat on surface which it doesn't when uncased. Comes in great packaging and arrived super promptly. I'm looking forward to the case developing a lovely patina with wear.
